detailsData.title: Automated Analysis
detailsData.content: Automated analysis can help at every step of contract negotiation. We’re integrating it seamlessly into every lawyer’s workflow.

detailsData.title: AI Integration
detailsData.content: AI-generated redlines and comments based on your preferences. Fully integrated into Microsoft Word.

detailsData.title: Playbook Management
detailsData.content: You’re in control of the redlines Pincites suggests. Use your existing guidance, our industry-standard checks, or work with us to create a new bespoke playbook.

detailsData.title: Third-Party Paper Support
detailsData.content: After success with AI redline suggestions for first-party paper we launched 'checks' for third-party paper.

subHeading: AI contract review for busy legal teams
valueProp: We’re building the future of contract negotiation. Automated analysis can help at every step of contract negotiation. We’re integrating it seamlessly into every lawyer’s workflow.

testimonalData.text: Pincites has revolutionized our contract negotiation process. The AI-generated redlines are incredibly accurate.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: The integration with Microsoft Word makes it so easy to use. Our legal team loves it.
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: The playbook management feature is a game-changer. We can now ensure consistency across all our contracts.
testimonalData.author: Emily Johnson
